要安全隐私的话，推荐使用自由软件，fdroid 这个应用市场里全是自由软件，
里面有一个去中心化的IM，强烈推荐Ensichat 

还有这个RIOT也不错
RIOT

以下是英文简介：
Instant messenger that is fully decentralized. Messages are encrypted and sent directly between devices via Bluetooth or Internet, without any central server. Relay nodes are used to ensure message delivery, even if the target node is offline
